text: Ølst is a town in Randers municipality, Denmark. A slow-moving landslide (map) was discovered in December 2023; The prime minister of Denmark came (late- January 2024) to look at the problem.https://www.nrk.no/vestland/norsk-jord- trugar-dansk-bygd-etter-jordskred-fra-avfallsanlegget-nordic-waste-1.16728627 Geography: The town is on the Jutland peninsula. == References == Category:Towns in Denmark
title: Ølst
